# Government Tender Announcement
## W2037-230072 Battery Rack Shelving Procurement

### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for the delivery and installation of shelving, cabinets and workbenches to create four (4) storage cages, each containing the same products, located in a centralized work area. This requirement is conditionally limited to Canadian goods and services.

### Tender Details

* **Tender ID**: WS4220074297
* **Publication Date**: November 29th, 2023
* **Closing Date**: March 8th, 2024 at 14:00 Hrs EST
* **Contract Start Date**: October 23rd, 2023
* **Contract End Date**: April 30th, 2024
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Key Requirements

* Deliver and install shelving, cabinets and workbenches to create four (4) storage cages.
* Meet the Canadian content requirement (see Offeror Declaration Form for details).
* Provide a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation if requested by the bidder.

### Additional Information

* A visit to the tender site is mandatory for all interested bidders.
* A pre-bid conference will not be conducted.
* The acceptor of this tender is the Department of National Defence (DND).

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Brodie White (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: brodie.white@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18040287?extsite=MTgwNDAyODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
